title: Anand Panyarachun Prime Minister of Thailand

quotes: fair general elections in May 1992 to return democratic rule to the Thai people
He retired following the general elections of September that year.
In 1997, Anand was elected to the Thai Constitution Drafting Assembly and appointed Chairman.
His oversight led to a successful ratification of the new Constitution later that year.
